org.barghos.math

Class Maths

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.barghos.math.Maths

  • public class Maths
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains mathematical methods and precalculated constants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEG_TO_RAD
      This value is a precalculated scalar for conversation from degrees to radians.
      static double HALF_PI
      This is the precalculated Half-PI (PI / 2).
      static double INV_SQRT2
      This is a precalculated inversed square-root of the number 2 (1 / sqrt(2)).
      static double INV_SQRT3
      This is a precalculated inversed square-root of the number 3 (1 / sqrt(3)).
      static double KINDA_SMALL_NUMBER
      A very small number used for determining if two floating point numbers are close enough together to count as equal.
      static double PI
      The number PI with 11 digits after point.
      static double RAD_TO_DEG
      This value is a precalculated scalar for conversation from radians to degrees.
      static double SMALL_NUMBER
      A very small number used for determining if a floating point number is technically zero.

    • Field Detail

      • PI

        public static final double PI
        The number PI with 11 digits after point.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HALF_PI

        public static final double HALF_PI
        This is the precalculated Half-PI (PI / 2). It's used in some trigonomic calculations.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEG_TO_RAD

        public static final double DEG_TO_RAD
        This value is a precalculated scalar for conversation from degrees to radians. Just multiply it with an angle messured in degree and you get the angle in radians.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RAD_TO_DEG

        public static final double RAD_TO_DEG
        This value is a precalculated scalar for conversation from radians to degrees. Just multiply it with an angle messured in radians and you get the angle in degrees.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INV_SQRT2

        public static final double INV_SQRT2
        This is a precalculated inversed square-root of the number 2 (1 / sqrt(2)). It's commonly used for precalculated diagonal normal vectors i.e. vec3(1,1,0).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INV_SQRT3

        public static final double INV_SQRT3
        This is a precalculated inversed square-root of the number 3 (1 / sqrt(3)). It's commonly used for precalculated diagonal normal vectors i.e. vec3(1,1,1).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SMALL_NUMBER

        public static final double SMALL_NUMBER
        A very small number used for determining if a floating point number is technically zero.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KINDA_SMALL_NUMBER

        public static final double KINDA_SMALL_NUMBER
        A very small number used for determining if two floating point numbers are close enough together to count as equal.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static boolean isZero(double value,

        Checks if the value is zero with given tolerance.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check for 0.
        tolerance - The threshold around 0.
        Returns:
        is the value 0.

      • isZero

        public static boolean isZero(double value)
        Checks if the value is zero with tolerance of SMALL_NUMBER(1.e-8f).
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check for 0.
        Returns:
        is the value 0.
